casebody.data:
Pamela L. TREES, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
PFIZER, INC., Pfizer International, LLC, Greenstone, LLC, formerly known as Greenstone Limited, and Meijer Inc., Defendants-Appellees. Carol Bearup, Barbara Beecham, Sonya Mency, Viola Moses, and Heather Macks, Plaintiffs-Appellants,
v.
Pfizer, Inc., Pfizer International, LLC, Greenstone, LLC, formerly known as Greenstone Limited, Meijer, Inc., and CVS Caremark, Defendants-Appellees,
and
Wal-Mart Stores, Inc. doing business as Sam's Club also known as Sam's East, Inc., and Does 1-50, Defendants. SC: 159054
SC: 159055
COA: 338297
COA: 340191 Supreme Court of Michigan. April 17, 2019

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of defendant-appellee CVS Caremark to extend the time for filing its answer to the application for leave to appeal in No. 159055 is GRANTED. The answer submitted on April 11, 2019, is accepted as timely filed.
